mapper.update:
update developer_apps
APP_NAME = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_DESC = #{appDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_TYPE = #{appType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FEE_TYPE = #{feeType,jdbcType=CHAR},
APP_VER = #{appVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_PLATFORM = #{appPlatform,jdbcType=CHAR},
DOWNLOAD_URL = #{downloadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_ICON_URL = #{appIconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACKAGE_NAME = #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OS_LEAST_VER = #{osLeastVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACKAGE_SIZE = #{packageSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER_ID = #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
KEYWORD = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APP_STATUS = #{appStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
AD_TYPES = #{adTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TARGET_SEX = #{targetSex,jdbcType=CHAR},
TARGET_TAG = #{targetTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TARGET_AGE = #{targetAge,jdbcType=CHAR},
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_ORIGINALNAME = #{appOriginalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AD_TYPE1 = #{adType1,jdbcType=CHAR},
AD_TYPE2 = #{adType2,jdbcType=CHAR},
AD_TYPE3 = #{adType3,jdbcType=CHAR},
JFQ_HDYZKEY = #{jfqHdyzkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JFQ_HDURL = #{jfqHdurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JFQ_VIRMONEY = #{jfqVirmoney,jdbcType=CHAR},
JFQ_VIRMONEY_UNIT = #{jfqVirmoneyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JFQ_VIRMONEY_RATE = #{jfqVirmoneyRate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CP_ONE = #{cpOne,jdbcType=CHAR},
CP_TWO = #{cpTwo,jdbcType=CHAR},
CP_THREE = #{cpThree,jdbcType=CHAR},
BANNER_ONE = #{bannerOne,jdbcType=CHAR},
BANNER_TWO = #{bannerTwo,jdbcType=CHAR},
BANNER_THREE = #{bannerThree,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUALITY_LEVEL = #{qualityLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
MISTAKE_CLICK = #{mistakeClick,jdbcType=CHAR},
PACKAGE_DOWNLOAD_URL = #{packageDownloadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHUNT_URL = #{shuntUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_SIZE = #{appSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
APP_KEYWORDS = #{appKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_REFUSE_REASON = #{appRefuseReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MP_BUSINESS_NAME = #{mpBusinessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_USER_NAME = #{operUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update developer_apps set APP_NAME = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_DESC = #{appDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_TYPE = #{appType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FEE_TYPE = #{feeType,jdbcType=CHAR}, APP_VER = #{appVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_PLATFORM = #{appPlatform,jdbcType=CHAR}, DOWNLOAD_URL = #{downloadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_ICON_URL = #{appIconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACKAGE_NAME = #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OS_LEAST_VER = #{osLeastVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACKAGE_SIZE = #{packageSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_ID = #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, KEYWORD = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APP_STATUS = #{appStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, AD_TYPES = #{adTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TARGET_SEX = #{targetSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, TARGET_TAG = #{targetTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TARGET_AGE = #{targetAge,jdbcType=CHAR}, APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_ORIGINALNAME = #{appOriginalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AD_TYPE1 = #{adType1,jdbcType=CHAR}, AD_TYPE2 = #{adType2,jdbcType=CHAR}, AD_TYPE3 = #{adType3,jdbcType=CHAR}, JFQ_HDYZKEY = #{jfqHdyzkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JFQ_HDURL = #{jfqHdurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JFQ_VIRMONEY = #{jfqVirmoney,jdbcType=CHAR}, JFQ_VIRMONEY_UNIT = #{jfqVirmoneyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JFQ_VIRMONEY_RATE = #{jfqVirmoneyRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CP_ONE = #{cpOne,jdbcType=CHAR}, CP_TWO = #{cpTwo,jdbcType=CHAR}, CP_THREE = #{cpThree,jdbcType=CHAR}, BANNER_ONE = #{bannerOne,jdbcType=CHAR}, BANNER_TWO = #{bannerTwo,jdbcType=CHAR}, BANNER_THREE = #{bannerThree,jdbcType=CHAR}, QUALITY_LEVEL = #{qualityLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, MISTAKE_CLICK = #{mistakeClick,jdbcType=CHAR}, PACKAGE_DOWNLOAD_URL = #{packageDownloadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHUNT_URL = #{shuntUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_SIZE = #{appSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, APP_KEYWORDS = #{appKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_REFUSE_REASON = #{appRefuseReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MP_BUSINESS_NAME = #{mpBusinessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_USER_NAME = #{operUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.ID AS `id`, a.APP_NAME AS appName, a.APP_TYPE AS appType, a.APP_STATUS AS appStatus, a.AD_TYPE1 AS adType1, a.AD_TYPE2 AS adType2, a.AD_TYPE3 AS adType3, a.OWNER_ID AS ownerId, b.NICKNAME AS ownerName, a.MP_BUSINESS_NAME AS mpBusinessName, a.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.`CREATE_TIME`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as `createTimeStr`, a.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.`UPDATE_TIME`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as `updateTimeStr`, a.OPER_USER_NAME AS operUserName FROM developer_apps a LEFT JOIN developer_info b ON a.OWNER_ID = b.ID LEFT JOIN sys_media_category c on a.APP_TYPE=c.ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.APP_STATUS = #{status}
AND a.APP_STATUS != 1 and a.APP_STATUS != 10
AND a.AD_TYPE1 = 1
AND a.AD_TYPE2 = 1
AND a.AD_TYPE3 = 1
AND ( c.`DESC` LIKE #{param} OR a.ID LIKE #{param} OR a.APP_NAME LIKE #{param} OR b.NICKNAME LIKE #{param} OR b.REAL_NAME LIKE #{param} OR a.MP_BUSINESS_NAME LIKE #{param} )
ORDER BY a.CREATE_TIME DESC limit #{limitstart} ,#{limitend}

SELECT a.ID as `id`, b.NICKNAME as ownerName, a.APP_NAME as appName, a.APP_PLATFORM as appPlatform, a.APP_TYPE as appType, a.AD_TYPE1 as adType1, a.AD_TYPE2 as adType2, a.AD_TYPE3 as adType3, a.APP_STATUS as appStatus, a.PACKAGE_SIZE as packageSize, a.APP_DESC as appDesc, a.KEYWORD as appKeywords, a.PACKAGE_DOWNLOAD_URL as packageDownloadUrl, a.DOWNLOAD_URL as downloadUrl, a.SHUNT_URL as shuntUrl, a.PACKAGE_NAME as packageName, a.APP_REFUSE_REASON as appRefuseReason, a.QUALITY_LEVEL as qualityLevel, a.MISTAKE_CLICK as mistakeClick, a.OWNER_ID as ownerId FROM developer_apps a LEFT JOIN developer_info b ON a.OWNER_ID = b.ID WHERE a.ID = #{0}

SELECT c.`ID` as developerid, c.NICKNAME as developername, a.APP_NAME as appName, a.APP_PLATFORM as appplatform, a.AD_TYPE1 as adtype1, a.AD_TYPE2 as adtype2, a.AD_TYPE3 as adtype3, a.APP_STATUS as appStatus, a.`ID` as `id` FROM ( SELECT z.`ID`, z.APP_NAME, z.OWNER_ID, z.APP_PLATFORM, z.AD_TYPE1, z.AD_TYPE2, z.AD_TYPE3, z.APP_STATUS FROM developer_apps z WHERE z.ID =#{0} ) a LEFT JOIN developer_info c ON a.OWNER_ID = c.ID
SELECT a.`ID` AS `id`, ( CASE a.APP_STATUS WHEN '9' THEN CONCAT_WS('', a.APP_NAME, '(封禁)') ELSE a.APP_NAME END ) AS `appName` FROM developer_apps a WHERE 1=1

SELECT a.ID AS `id`, CONCAT_WS( '', a.`DESC`, '--', COUNT(b.ID) ) AS catname FROM sys_media_category a LEFT JOIN developer_apps b ON a.ID = b.APP_TYPE AND b.APP_STATUS = '3' WHERE a.PID != '9999' GROUP BY a.ID
